basics.name: Cristian Milanes
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Engineering in the College of Engineering at the University of Hawaii at Manoa. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2025.

work.summary: Frachise of a popular Korean Fried Chicken esablishment in Hawaii
highlights: Provide customer service and maintain front end store function
Prepare and work collaboratively to fulfill food orders and under pressure

volunteer.organization: Firmware Team Member, Smart Campus Energy Lab
volunteer.summary: Work with a group of engineering students to develop weatherboxes which are used to gather meteorological data to train forecasting models and optimize renewable energy efficiency
highlights: Maintain existing software and develop quality of life changes for the system
Assist hardware teams with technical issues

awards.title: B+ Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with a minimum overall GPA of 3.0 at a Hawai'i public school.

awards.title: Best in Category
awards.awarder: Hawaii State Science Engineering Fair Central District
awards.summary: My team won best in category for the HSSEF with an engineering project that would assist the visually impaired when navigating their surroundings
